name: Everything Everywhere All At Once
description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

name: The Whale
description: A reclusive, morbidly obese English teacher attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter.

name: The Elephants Whisperers
description: Bomman and Bellie, a couple in South India, devote their lives to caring for an orphaned baby elephant named Raghu, forging a family like no other that tests the barrier between the human and the animal world.

name: All Quiet on the Western Front
description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

name: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

name: Guillermo del Toroâ€™s Pinocchio
description: Animated film about a father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

name: Navalny
description: Follows the man who survived an assassination attempt by poisoning with a lethal nerve agent in August 2020. During his months-long recovery he makes shocking discoveries about the attempt on his life and decides to return home.

name: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox and The Horse
description: Follows a boy, a mole, a fox and a horse, as they create an unexpected friendship and travel together in the boy's search for home.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

name: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

name: RRR
description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.
